channel.title: Client problem [ip connecting]
channel.description: ok i changed ip of a client except it was a url that i changed (thats is only way to change ip as it is innovationx client) and i got this error when running the client compile works fine [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.openSocket(client.java:575) at client.login(client.java:6675) at client.processLoginScreenInput(client.java:11326) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2385) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:141) at client.run(client.java:5127) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code] ....
